woltar dayarathna – anuradhapura disa wisheshaparawahara chandarathana nahimiyange anugrahayen pranshaye jathyanthara bauddha madhyasthanaya magin (uthuru mada palathata wadi niyojanayak) labena se shri lankawe aarthika apahasutha athi sisun wenuwen dahasaya (16) weni wathawatath sidu karanu labana shishyathwa pradanothsawaya atamasthanadhipathi aacharya pallegama siriniwasa na himiyange pradhanathwayen mirisawatiya wiharadhipathi eethalwatunawawe nyanathilaka himiyange sanwidhanayen il purapasaloswak poho dina paswaru 2.00 ta mirisawatiya raja maha wiharastha pin bimedi pawathwe.
